Content:: Anthony Turgis (born 16 May 1994) is a French professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam Team TotalEnergies.[5] He was named in the startlist for the 2017 Vuelta a Espa√±a.[6] In July 2018, he was named in the start list for the Tour de France.[7] His brothers Jimmy Turgis and Tanguy Turgis also competed professionally in cycling, before both had to retire due to heart conditions.[8][9]
